VIEW_SOURCE: CREATE ALGORITHM=UNDEFINED DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` SQL SECURITY DEFINER VIEW `v1_penerimaan` AS select `aa`.`id` AS `id`,`aa`.`id_pengadaan` AS `id_pengadaan`,`aa`.`a` AS `a`,`aa`.`b` AS `b`,`aa`.`c` AS `c`,`aa`.`d` AS `d`,`aa`.`e` AS `e`,`aa`.`e1` AS `e1`,`aa`.`id_gudang` AS `id_gudang`,`aa`.`tgl_penerimaan` AS `tgl_penerimaan`,`aa`.`penerima` AS `penerima`,`aa`.`merk_barang` AS `merk_barang`,`aa`.`supplier` AS `supplier`,`aa`.`faktur_tgl` AS `faktur_tgl`,`aa`.`faktur_no` AS `faktur_no`,`aa`.`f` AS `f`,`aa`.`g` AS `g`,`aa`.`h` AS `h`,`aa`.`i` AS `i`,`aa`.`j` AS `j`,`aa`.`jml_barang` AS `jml_barang`,`aa`.`harga` AS `harga`,`aa`.`satuan` AS `satuan`,`aa`.`jml_harga` AS `jml_harga`,`aa`.`ba_no` AS `ba_no`,`aa`.`ba_tgl` AS `ba_tgl`,`aa`.`ket` AS `ket`,`aa`.`jenis_barang` AS `jenis_barang`,`aa`.`tahun` AS `tahun`,`bb`.`nm_barang` AS `nm_barang`,`aa`.`nip_penerima` AS `nip_penerima`,`aa`.`nip_pemeriksa` AS `nip_pemeriksa`,`aa`.`pemeriksa` AS `pemeriksa`,`aa`.`nip_penyimpan` AS `nip_penyimpan`,`aa`.`penyimpan` AS `penyimpan`,`cc`.`nm_gudang` AS `nm_gudang` from ((`penerimaan` `aa` left join `ref_barang` `bb` on(((`aa`.`f` = `bb`.`f`) and (`aa`.`g` = `bb`.`g`) and (`aa`.`h` = `bb`.`h`) and (`aa`.`i` = `bb`.`i`) and (`aa`.`j` = `bb`.`j`)))) left join `ref_gudang` `cc` on(((`aa`.`c` = `cc`.`c`) and (`aa`.`d` = `cc`.`d`) and (`aa`.`e` = `cc`.`e`) and (`aa`.`id_gudang` = `cc`.`id_gudang`))))
